review_blob: Bottle. Pours opaque black with small offwhite head. Aroma is roasted malt, ground coffee and peated sweet whisky. Taste is very sweet, light bitter and light umami. Body is creamy to syrupy with such carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes of malt, malt syrup, sweet whisky, honey, vanilla, white sugar and hints of juniper.

Bottle. Pours opaque chestnut with medium didnt white head. Aroma is malt, caramel, malt syrup, malt drops, honey, spice and hint of gravy. Taste is very sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is creamy with soft carbonation. Finish is long and balanced sweet and bitter with notes of caramel, malt, malt drops, plums syrup, cinnamon, nutmeg and honey.

Bottle. Pours light hazy reddish brown with small white head. Aroma is malt, raspberry, boysenberry, redcurrant and pinot noir wine. Taste is light to medium sweet, light bitter, faint acidic and light umami. Body is oily with light fizzy carbonation. Finish is long and balanced sweet and bitter with notes of raspberry, cherry, redcurrant, malt, port and pinot noir wine. Lots of fruit and berry yet not too sweet.
beer_name: Vestfyen Willemoes 55 Grader Nord Rd Lager

review_blob: UPDATED: APR 20, 2016

Bottle. Pours opaque black with medium brown head. Aroma is roasted malt, apples, soy sauce and prunes. Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes that follow the nose.

Bottle. Pours clear light chestnut with medium white head. Aroma is malt, apple seeds, walnuts and dandelions. Taste is medium sweet, light bitter and faint acidic. Body is oily with soft carbonation. Finish is a bit short and mostly sweet with notes if malt, caramel, syrup, biscuits and sweet apples.

Bottle. Pours clear pale yellow with medium white head. Aroma is malt, grain and lemon. Taste is light sweet and medium bitter. Body is watery with good carbonation. Finish is mostly bitter with notes that follow the nose.

Bottle. Pours clear dark reddish amber with large white head. Aroma is malt, grain, cereal, rye bread, copper and hints of lemon. Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is light oily with light carbonation. Finish is long and light bitter with notes that follow the nose.

Bottle. Pours hazy amber with medium white head. Aroma is pomelo, toffee, sweet orange, milk chocolate, malt and hints of spruce. Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with light fizzy carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes if malt, caramel, citrus fruits, sour green apples, lime and hints of yeast. Smooth and surprisingly refreshing.

Bottle. Pours opaque black with large offwhite head. Aroma is malt, soy sauce, sweet licorice and coffee. Taste is medium sweet, light bitter and light acidic. Body is light creamy with soft carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes of malt, sweet licorice, ammonium chloride, mint, soy sauce and espresso.
UPDATED: MAR 24, 2016
UPDATED: MAR 23, 2016

Bottle. Pours clear golden with small white head. Aroma is sweet malt, grain, apple seeds, syrup and hints of lemon. Taste is medium sweet and medium bitter. Body is light oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and balanced sweet and bitter with notes of malt, grain, caramel, fudge, sour apples and see rye biscuits.

Bottle. Pours opaque black with huge foamy brown head. Aroma is malt, roasted malt, lemon, apples and hints of soy sauce. Taste is medium sweet, medium bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with light carbonation. Finish is long and mostly bitter with notes of malt, apples, caramel, coffee, fudge, buscuits, soy sauce and gravy.

Bottle. Pours clear dark mahogany with medium white head. Aroma of malt, prunes, gravy, malt syrup, sweet red apples, apricot jam and wholemeal biscuits. Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter and faint acidic. Body is smooth and light creamy with soft carbonation. Finish is long and sweet with notes of malt, syrup, biscuits, fruit, soy sauce and gravy.

Bottle. Pours clear dark golden with medium white foamy head. Aroma is malt, grain, lemon, hops, hay and hints of iron. Taste is light sweet, light to medium bitter and light to medium acidic. Body is light oily with sparkling carbonation. Finish off medium long and mostly bitter with notes that follow the nose plus some sugar, dandelion and woody notes.

Bottle. Pours clear dark heather honey with small white head. Aroma is malt, apples and honey. Taste is medium sweet and light bitter. Body is light oily with sparkling carbonation. Finish is medium long and mostly sweet with notes, malt, apple seeds and soap.

Bottle. Pours hazy amber with medium white head. Aroma is malt, caramel, hops, spruce, mandarin and nutmeg. Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is light oily with medium carbonation. Finish is a bit short and mostly sweet with notes that follow the nose.
beer_name: rbk Fionia Nyborg The Bitter End Organic IPA

review_blob: Bottle. Pours clear golden yellow with medium foamy white head. Aroma is grain, malt, copper, hops, spruce, orange, mandarin peel, grass and "bending magnet cooling water". Taste is light to medium sweet, light bitter and light to medium acidic. Body is light syrupy with soft carbonation. Finish off long and balanced sweet, bitter and acidic with notes that follow the nose.

Bottle. Pours opaque black with medium brown head. Aroma is sweet licorice, malt syrup, mint, oatmeal, ammonium chloride and cough drops. Taste is light to medium sweet, light bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with fizzy carbonation. Finish is long and balanced bitter and sweet with notes of malt, licorice, cereal, caramel, oatmeal, mint, dried fruit and cough drops. Smooth and well balanced.

Bottle. Pours clear dark coffee brown with small white head. Aroma is sweet malt, malt syrup, malt drops, caramel, rye bread and "llebrd". Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is light syrupy with soft carbonation. Finish is lung and very sweet with notes is malt, malt syrup and caramel.

Bottle. Pours hazy honey yellow with small white head. Aroma is malt, caramel and hints of spruce and pineapple. Taste is light to medium sweet, medium bitter and light acidic. Body is light oily with sparking carbonation. Finish is long and mostly bitter with notes of malt, sugar, caramel, lemon, pineapple, pink grapefruit and hints of fresh point wood.

Bottle. Pours clear dark cola brown with small light brown head. Aroma is malt syrup, brown sugar, burnt caramelised sugar and hints of gravy. Taste is medium sweet, faint to light bitter and medium acidic. Body is light oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes of malt, caramel, soy sauce, gravy and hints if ammonium chloride.

Bottle. Pours pitch black with huge creamy light brown head. Aroma is intense and complex with roasted malt, green sour plums, gun powder, wet cardboard, oysters, fish marked, horse blanket, freshly ground coffee beans, gravy, soy sauce and salty licorice. Taste is light to medium sweet, medium bitter, light acidic and medium umami. Body is oily with light fizzy carbonation. Finish use long and bitter with notes of milk, spruce, soy sauce, licorice, coffee, prunes, apples, Thai fish sauce and hints of dry gin. Good complexity if not served too cold.

Bottle. Gift from Terje. Pours hazy golden amber with small white head. Aroma is malt, orange, mandarin, caramel, sugar, bread, allspice and cardamom. Taste is light sweet, medium to very bitter, light to medium acidic and light umami. Body is light syrupy with sparking carbonation. Finish is long and mostly bitter with notes of malt, caramel, pepper, allspice, juniper, sweet licorice, bread and roasted malt (swartzbier style). Very interesting beer with good complexity.

Bottle 4 months over BBE date. Pours dark coffee brown almost black with medium light brown head. Aroma is malt drops, sage, rye bread, ammonium chloride and soy sauce. Taste is light to medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light umami. Body is oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and complex umami with notes of raw licorice, caramel, burnt sugar, prunes, gravy, pine wood, black filter coffee, bread and hints of sweet oranges and grapefruit. Very rich

Bottle. Pours opaque black with medium creamy light brown head. Aroma is roasted malt, sweet licorice, mandarin, orange, orange fudge, Cointreau and orange flowers. Taste is medium sweet, light bitter and medium umami. Body is creamy with soft carbonation. Finish is long and balanced bitter and sweet with notes of malt, chalk, soy sauce, orange, mandarin, cardamom, nutmeg, caramel, fudge, milk, cookies and rye. Very complex and very rich. Excellent porter
beer_name: Mikkeller Orange Yuzu Glad I Said Porter

review_blob: Bottle. Pours opaque dark leather brown with huge light brown head. Aroma is malt, lemon, yeast, coffee, cooked vegetables and Vegemite. Taste is medium sweet, light bitter and light to medium acidic. Body is creamy to oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes of malt, syrup, wool, popcorn and cereal.

Bottle. Pours opaque pale amber with huge white head. Aroma is bitter grapefruit, pomelo, mandarin, malt, ammonium chloride and caramel. Taste is light to medium sweet, medium to very bitter and light to medium acidic. Body is watery with sparkling carbonation. Finish is long and mostly bitter with notes of malt, grapefruit, sour orange, pomelo, caramel, spruce and plums.

Bottle. Pours clear dark reddish brown with huge white head. Aroma is malt, plums, brown sugar, caramel, fudge and lemon. Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light to medium acidic. Body is syrupy with sparking carbonation. Finish is long with notes of Belgian yeast, plums, tamarind, butter and cardamom.

Bottle. Pours murky coffee brown with large light brown head. Aroma is malt drops, cough drops, dates, figs, prunes, pomelo and grease ("fedte brd" and "klejner"). Taste is light to medium sweet, medium bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with fizzy carbonation. Finish is long and mostly bitter with notes of malt, caramel, bitter grapefruit, dark chocolate, burnt sugar, gravy and spruce. Nice aroma but a bit disappointing taste.

Bottle. Pours light hazy deep amber with huge white head. Aroma is intense hoppy with notes of spruce, pine, resin, bitter grapefruit peel and soap but also some fruits like mandarin, apple and figs. Taste is medium sweet, very bitter and light acidic. Body of oily with medium fizzy carbonation. Finish is long and mostly bitter with notes of spruce, pine, bitter grapefruit, malt, caramel, fudge, hazelnut syrup and faint hints of ginger. Nice complexity.

Bottle. Pours opaque black with medium white foamy head. Aroma is malt, soy sauce, sweet apples and hints of mint and sweet licorice. Taste is medium to very sweet, light at medium bitter, medium umami and faint acidic. Body is creamy with soft carbonation. Finish is long and more sweet than bitter with notes of malt, gravy, apples, prunes, nutmeg, cardamom, port wine and hints of lime peel.

Bottle. Pours clear cola dark brown with medium white head. Aroma is malt, vanilla, cocoa, Granny Smith apples and hints of sweet licorice. Taste is medium sweet, light bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with lively carbonation. Finish is long and balanced bitter and sweet with notes of malt, sugar, caramel, fudge, muscavado and syrup.

Bottle. Pours clear golden yellow with huge foamy white head. Aroma is mild with sweet malt, sugar, honey, white wine, wheat bread, black currant jam and lemon peel. Taste is light to medium sweet, medium bitter, light umami and light to medium acidic. Body is oily with sparking carbonation. Finish is long and balanced bitter and sweet with notes of malt, sugar, barley wine, yeast, dried apricot and overripe fruit. Plain and not very Christmasy

Bottle. Pours murky dark reddish cola black with medium light brown head. Aroma is malt, red wine, plums, gala apples and buckwheat. Taste is medium sweet, light bitter, medium umami and light salty. Body is oily with duct carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes of malt, tamarind and miso soup. Too mild for my taste.

Bottle. Pours clear dark reddish brown with medium white head. Aroma is intense malt, malt syrup, malt drops, biscuits, butter, butterscotch, grassy hops and faint hints of spruce. Taste of light to medium sweet, light bitter and faint acidic. Body is watery to light oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with lots of malty notes but also bread, biscuits, caramel, butterscotch, fudge, lemon, pale syrup and hints of ground coffee and cinnamon. Nice English ale with hints of Christmas.

Bottle. Pours opaque pale honey yellow with tiny white head. Aroma is banana cake, wheat bread, cloves and turmeric. Taste is light sweet, faint to light bitter and light acidic. Body is light oily with medium carbonation. Finish is a bit short with notes of malt, wheat, banana and cloves. Not very Christmasy

Bottle. Pours opaque dark coffee brown with medium brown head. Aroma is prunes, dried ginger, cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, nutmeg, port wine, orange peel and brown sugar (exactly the same ingredients as go into my homemade "glgg" extract). Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter, light acidic, light umami and faint salty. Body is oily to syrupy with soft carbonation. Finish is long, rich and complex with notes of "glgg", gravy, coffee, Christmas cookies, Christmas pudding, raw licorice and all the spices mentioned above. Definitely "peculiar" and definitely "Christmas". Thumbs up for brewing something different!

Bottle. Pours hazy brownish amber with small white head. Aroma is orange, grapefruit, green grapes and fried rose leaves. Taste is medium sweet, medium bitter and light acidic. Body is light oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and balanced sweet and bitter with notes of malt, grapes, ginger and nutmeg

Bottle. Pours opaque dark reddish coffee-brown with small white head. Aroma is roasted malt, cola, soy sauce, gravy, Belle de Boskoop and black coffee. Taste is medium to very sweet, light bitter and faint acidic. Body is milky with soft carbonation. Finish is long and sweet with notes of malt, rye bread, apple pie, sweet licorice, black coffee and malt syrup. Nice tmavy

Bottle. Pours opaque coffee black with larger light brown head. Aroma is malt, caramel, prunes, (warm) elderberry juice, iron and hints of licorice root. Taste is light to medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with lively carbonation. Finish is a bit short and mostly sweet with notes of malt, caramel, syrup, prunes, cinnamon, black currant jam and apricot. Not very Christmasy

Bottle. Pours hazy reddish light brown with huge offwhite creamy head. Aroma is passion fruit, orange, pomelo, dried hops, spruce and malt syrup. Taste is medium sweet, medium to very bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and balanced bitter and sweet with notes of passion fruit, pomelo, caramel, toffee, orange, mandarin, cream, raspberry yogurt and hints of spices. Smooth and nicely balanced.

Bottle. Pours murky dark cola brown with medium white head. Aroma is strawberry bubble gum, cherry cola, cherry lambic, malt and yeast. Taste is very sweet, light bitter and light acidic. Body is syrupy with mild carbonation. Finish is long and sweet with notes of cherry, strawberry, caramel, fudge, malt syrup, bubble gum, mint and ginger. Very sweet but not too sweet and nicely balanced

Bottle. Pours hazy chestnut with small white head. Aroma is malt, caramel, lemon and hints of coffee and biscuits. Taster is medium sweet, light acidic and faint bitter. Body is oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long annex mostly sweet with notes that follow the nose. Not much Christmas in this one, but a nice ale it is.

Bottle. Pours opaque reddish black with small white head. Aroma is roasted malt, soy sauce, ground coffee, sour apples and hints of sweet licorice and campfire smoke. Taste is medium to very sweet and light bitter. Body is creamy with soft carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes of malt syrup, black coffee, soy sauce and hints of ammonium chloride and mint. Mild, smooth and pleasant but not very Christmas-like.

Bottle. Pours opaque black with small offwhite head. Aroma is roasted malt, cardamom, nutmeg, sweet preserved ginger, dates, figs, prunes, port wine and "glgg". Taste is very sweet, light umami and faint bitter. Body is oily with soft carbonation. Finish is long and sweet with notes of malt, port wine, prunes, dates, cardamom, dried ginger, "glgg" and dark syrup. Intense and rich but perhaps a but too sweet.

Bottle. Pours opaque chestnut brown with huge white creamy head. Aroma is vague with notes of roasted malt, caramel and milk stout. Taste is medium to very sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is creamy with soft fizzy carbonation. Finish is long and mostly sweet with notes of malt, dark chocolate, orange, grapefruit juice, plums, milk and hints of balsamic vinegar,

Bottle. Pours hazy pale yellow with huge white head. Aroma is malt, cloves, nutmeg, milk, dust and flour. Taste is light sweet, light bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with fizzy carbonation. Finish is long and mostly bitter and acidic with notes of sparking water with lemon, cloves, chili, bread, dust, banana and yogurt. Nice but no Christmas notes.

Bottle. Pours opaque coffee brown with large light brown head. Aroma is malt, crust of wheat bread, prunes and sultana raisins. Taste is medium sweet, light to medium bitter and light acidic. Body is oily with fizzy carbonation. Finish is looking and balanced sweet and bitter with notes of malt, sour apple juice, soy sauce and white sugar.
